price: Mennim sε ebia (twεn a Nyankopͻn retwentwεn asotwee no soͻ no) yε nsͻhwε ma mo, anaasε (Ͻde rema mo) agye moani akͻpem εberε bi.
arabic: وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِي لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتۡنَةٞ لَّكُمۡ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-in adrī laʿallahu fit'natun lakum wamatāʿun ilā ḥīnin
